ADOdb

Database Abstraction Layer for PHP

Supported Databases

  1. Full support
    • IBM DB2
    • Microsoft SQL Server
    • MySQL
    • Oracle
    • PostgreSQL
    • SQLite Database
  2. Partial support
    • Firebird & Interbase
    • LDAP
    • Microsoft Access
    • ODBC
    • PDO
    • PDO (new)
  3. Obsolete/Unsupported Drivers
